content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "dirt", "quantity": 61, "index": 18}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 45, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 36}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a jungle_boat, I need to craft jungle_planks. Jungle_planks require placing a jungle_log in the crafting grid, so I will move the jungle_log from slot 43 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 61, "index": 18}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 45, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 36}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the jungle_planks, I need to move them out of the crafting grid so I can continue crafting.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 61, "index": 18}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 45, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 36}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a jungle boat, I first need to craft 3 jungle planks. To craft jungle planks, I need to place a jungle log in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the jungle log from slot 43 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 61, "index": 18}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 45, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 36}]
thought: Now I can craft the jungle planks by moving them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 61, "index": 18}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 45, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 36}]

thought: To craft a jungle boat, I need to place 3 jungle planks in a specific shape on the crafting table. The first plank should be placed in the top left corner (slot 1), so I will move one from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 61, "index": 18}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 45, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 36}]
thought: The second plank should be placed in the bottom left corner (slot 3), so I will move another one from slot 11 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 61, "index": 18}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 45, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 36}]
thought: The third plank should be placed in the middle right (slot 4), so I will move another one from slot 11 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 61, "index": 18}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 45, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 36}]
thought: The fourth plank should be placed in the top right (slot 5), so I will move another one from slot 11 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 61, "index": 18}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 45, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 36}]

Ok

inventory=[{"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 61, "index": 18}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 45, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 36}]
